title: The Great Reset-sion: Can We Survive Biden's Economic Suicide? | Guests: Jack Carr & Carol Roth | 7/29/22
description:
Glenn dives further into his critique of CNN's claim that an "imposter Christianity" consisting of "white Christian nationalists" is plaguing America and reveals the simple belief system it takes to be a true American. Bill O'Reilly discusses the week's most important news, including the Left's ongoing mission to change our language. Author Michael Malice shares his thoughts on progressives pushing the woke term "Filipinx" and the latest Big Tech attacks on free speech. Author and executive producer of "The Terminal List" Jack Carr reveals how the Amazon Prime adaption came about and the inspiration behind the Deep State plotline. Recovering investment banker Carol Roth joins to expose the Biden administration's planned recession.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
